title: Official Documentation
summary: Access the comprehensive technical documentation for integrators and developers.
content:
Developer Resources

Building on top of Intent Protocol? We provide extensive documentation for our SDKs and APIs.

Key Resources

  • Intent Relayer API: Full reference for the REST/WebSocket API.
  • TypeScript SDK: @intent-protocol/client for frontend integration.
  • Smart Contracts: Architecture diagrams for the Move modules.

Please visit our Official Docs Site (Coming Soon) or check the /docs/official folder in the repository.
author: Engineering
